snippet: CNN, a unit of Time Warner, and Mashable are in advanced talks that may lead to an acquisition of the social news Web site, three people briefed on the talks said.
abstract: CNN, a unit of Time Warner, and Mashable are in advanced talks that may lead to an acquisition of the social news Web site, three people briefed on the talks said.

headline.main: CNN Is Said to Be in Talks to Acquire Mashable
headline.print_headline: CNN Is Said to Be Negotiating to Buy the News Web Site Mashable
